attributes.action: Introduce Black History As A Topic Alongside The History of Other Cultures
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this petition is simple - to introduce Black History as a topic taught alongside the histories of other cultures, every month of the year, in all schools from primary to secondary - rather than limiting the education of black history mostly to October.
The remembrance and celebration of Black History - including the inspirational modern-day  figures - must be kept alive, for the sake of children everywhere.
